welcome_subtitle: Sirdoonka Automation-ka ee la baran karo
not_configured_yet: Nidaamka weli ma habaysan Wizard habaynta ayaa kaa caawin doona in aad nidaamkaaga kor u qaaddo oo aad ku socoto dhawr tillaabo.
system_config_include_demo: Ku dar demo oo leh hawsha aaladda la matalay
empty_group: Ma jiro cutubyo ka tirsan kooxdan.
cronwizard_schedule_set_slot_end:
Laga bilaabo {{start}}.
 Habee dhamaadka wakhtiga booska.
cronwizard_bindings_define_types_and_mod: Qeex noocyada iyo cutubyada ku xiran jadwalkan (ikhtiyaar)
cronwizard_action_set_action_to_execute: Deji tallaabo aad ku fuliso dhacdooyinka dhacdadan
cronwizard_action_schedule_variable_hint: Isticmaal @{{name}} doorsoome ahaan tibaaxaha cron ama isticmaal Scheduler.IsScheduling("@{{name}}") barnaamijyada otomaatiga ah si aad u tixraacdo dhacdadan.
enable_to_run_program: Daar barnaamijka si aad u socodsiiso
tap_to_enable: Guji si aad karti ugu yeelato
main_code_empty_note: Koodhka "Main" waa madhan. Isticmaal tifaftiraha "Koodhka muuqaalka" si aad u soo saarto code-kan: - Ka fur qaybta "Barnaamijka" ee palette amarka ee bidix - Jiid block ka mid ah nooca "Main" ee goobta shaqada code-ka - Ku dar gudaha gudaha blocks codes kale si loo fuliyo ficilada iyo macquulka barnaamijkan Barnaamijka "Main" wuxuu noqon karaa mid gacanta ku shaqeeya ama si toos ah loo bilaabo iyadoo lagu saleynayo shuruudaha ugu dambeyntii lagu bixiyay code Setup.
setup_code_empty_note: Koodhka "Setup" waa madhan. Isticmaal tifaftiraha "Visual code" si aad u soo saarto koodkan: - Ka fur qaybta "Barnaamijka" palette amarka ee bidix - Jiid block ka mid ah nooca "Setup" ee goobta shaqada code-ka - Ku dar gudaha codesyada kale si aad u go'aamiso shuruudaha kicin doona "Main" code fulinta code Tani waa la qiimeeyaa mar kasta oo dhacdo cusub dhacdo iyo ugu yaraan hal mar daqiiqadii.
capture_commands_description: Ku dar dhammaan amarada gacanta lagu sameeyay barnaamijka.

16.Title: Heerka Xusuusta
16.Description: Kaydi oo dib u xasuuso heerkii u dambeeyay ee dimmer.
16.HomeGenie.LevelMemory: Dib u soo celi heerarkii nalka ee u dambeeyay marka la shido

26.Title: Nalalka Midabka
26.Description: Tusaale Philips Hue nalalka is dhexgalka isticmaalaya HTTP API (V1). Isticmaalaha caadiga ah ee ku xidha buundada waa "horumariyaha cusub" waana in mar hore la furo.

34.Title: Saadaasha Cimilada
34.Description: Macluumaadka cimilada iyo saadaasha adeega Khariidadda Cimilada Furan. Si aad u dhaqaajiso widget-kan gali furaha API sax ah. Raac tilmaamaha https://openweathermap.org/appid si aad u hesho furaha API oo bilaash ah.

77.Title: Shabakadda MQTT
77.Description: Ku xidh dilaaliinta MQTT si aad u isticmaasho barnaamijka HomeGenie Panel meel kasta adoo isticmaalaya Internet ama si aad isugu xidho aaladaha HomeGenie isla shabakadda MQTT.
77.MQTT.SensorPublish: Daabac dhacdooyinka uu soo saaray cutubkani

78.Title: Heer kulka Smart
78.Description: Isticmaal heerkul kasta oo dareemaha iyo beddelka smart si aad u hirgeliso shaqeynta heerkulbeegga.

81.Title: Kormeerka Tamarta
81.Description: Samee tirokoob ku saabsan isticmaalka tamarta iyo isticmaalka aaladaha.

82.Title: Habka Keydinta Tamarta
82.Description: Ka dhig heerka iftiinka ka hooseeya boqolleyda la habeyn karo.

88.Title: Kamarada IP-ga guud
88.IpCamera.ImageURL: Sawirka kamaradda API URL (eeg dukumentiyada kamaradaada)

90.Title: Nidaamka Alaarmiga Amniga
90.Description: Isticmaal dareemayaasha iyo aaladaha kale si aad u hirgeliso nidaamka digniinta amniga.
90.HomeGenie.SecurityTriggerHome: Sidoo kale kiciya marka guriga la hubeeyo
90.ConfigureOptions.Email.Recipients: Liiska fariimaha e-mail-ka qaataha u kala saaraya wargelinta digniinta
90.ConfigureOptions.System.SirenMaxTime: Sirens max Time (ilbiriqsiyo, 0= aan xad lahayn)
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.ArmedProgram: Barnaamij lagu socodsiiyo marka la hubeeyo
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.DisarmedProgram: Barnaamijka la wado marka hubka laga dhigo
90.ConfigureOptions.Trigger.TriggeredProgra: Barnaamujka la wado marka la kiciyo

111.Title: Isku xidhka macmiilka
111.Description: Waxay fulisaa API si ay u maamusho profile-ka qaabaynta macmiilka ee loo isticmaalo in lagu kaydiyo UI iyo setboards.

400.Title: Modules Virtual Demo
400.Description: Gacanta u deji qiyamka aaladda casriga ah.

401.Title: Demo - Toggle Albaabka
401.Description: Waxay u ekaysiisay albaabka furan/xiran ee dareenka albaabka-daaqadda.

402.Title: Muujinta - Mooshinka waa la ogaaday
402.Description: Waxay ka dhigaysaa ogaanshaha dhaqdhaqaaqa demo-dareemaha badan.

410.Title: Simulator Sensor
410.Simulator.Sensor.DataFrequency: Simulator ayaa sii daaya inta jeer

505.Title: Xakamaynta fog
505.Description: Ku xakamee qalabka adigoo isticmaalaya meel fog (IR ama RF).

142.Title: Koontada E-mailka
142.Description: Waxay kaydisaa macluumaadka akoontiga iimaylka ee ay isticmaalaan barnaamijyada nidaamka dirida/mayliyada.

145.Title: Aalad Wacan
145.Description: Daar/dami aaladda iyadoo lagu salaynayo ogaanshaha dhaqdhaqaaqa iyo iftiinka agagaaraha.
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.CheckLuminosity: Waxaa gacanta ku haya dareenka iftiinka (ikhtiyaar)
145.HomeGenie.SmartLights.SwitchOffTimeout: Demi ka dib wakhtiga hawl la'aanta (ilbiriqsi)

8.Title: Muuqaalka Midabbada Qorrax-u-soo-baxa
8.Description: Tusaale "Sunrise" seenyo loogu talagalay midab beddelka nalalka LED.

910.Title: Ogaanshaha Shayga
910.Description: Soo ogow walxaha addoo isticmaalaya qaabka YOLO11 horay loo tababaray.
910.ML.ObjectDetection.TriggerDetect: Liiska walxaha kala-saaran (Ingiriisi) ee kicin doona qaylo-dhaanta. (tusaale: bisad, eey, qof, shandad dhabarka, shandad)

911.Title: Qiyaasta booska
911.Description: Ogaanshaha dhibicda furaha iyada oo la adeegsanayo qiimaynta gogoldhigga, iyadoo la adeegsanayo moodooyinka ONNX ee caadiga ah ama nooca YOLOv11 ee horay loo tababaray ee caadiga ahaa

912.Title: Qaybta Tusaalaha
912.Description: Soo ogow walxaha iyo dulmarkooda adiga oo isticmaalaya qaabka YOLO11 horay loo tababaray.

930.Title: Gemini Intent Handler
930.Description: Waxay u saamaxdaa xakamaynta luqadda dabiiciga ah ee nidaamkaaga caqliga leh iyadoo la adeegsanayo Google Gemini AI. Si aad u dhaqaajiso sifadan, geli furaha API sax ah. Raac tilmaamaha https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey si aad u hesho furaha API bilaashka ah.

931.Title: Gemini Widget Genie
931.Description: Genie-gaaga gaarka ah ee AI ee abuuritaanka widget-kaaga. Waxaa ku shaqeeya Gemini, waxay kaa caawinaysaa inaad qorto oo aad ka saarto HTML, CSS, iyo JavaScript code si toos ah gudaha tifaftiraha HomeGenie. Si aad u dhaqaajiso sifadan, geli furaha API sax ah. Raac tilmaamaha https://aistudio.google.com/app/apikey si aad u hesho furaha API bilaashka ah.

940.Title: Deegaanka AI (LLM)
940.Description: Ku socodsii Model Luqadda Weyn (LLM) gudaha server-kaaga HomeGenie. Moodooyinkan waxaa lagala soo degsan karaa lacag la'aan goobaha sida Hugging Face. Kaliya bixi dariiqa faylka qaabka GGUF Fadlan ogow in hagaajinta cabbirada, ugu horrayn gudaha Xeerka Macnaha guud, laga yaabo in loo baahdo si loo hubiyo in si buuxda ula jaanqaadi karo noocyo kala duwan.
940.ConfigureOptions.ModelPath: Jidka loo maro faylka GGUF deegaanka
